attributes.action: Proscribe Hezzbollah in it's entirety as a terrorist organisation
attributes.additional_details: In 2001 the UK government proscribed Hezzbollah's Security Organisation. Hezzbollah's Military Wing was also proscribed in 2008. Apparently this includes the Jihad Council. It is not apparently not "UK government policy" to discuss any organisations under consideration for proscription.
attributes.background:
We undersigned demand Hezzbollah is proscribed as an terrorist organisation under the Terrorism Act 2000 in it's entirety. 

It is not UK government policy to discuss any organisations under consideration for proscription. 

The proscription of Hezzbollah MUST include the political wing.
